sentences.sContent: This has significant cost savings over purchasing and maintaining the hardware for jobs run intermittently.
sentences.sContent_eng: This has significant cost savings over purchasing and maintaining the hardware for jobs run intermittently.
sentences.sCn: 对于间歇运行的作业，这可以极大地节省购买和维护硬件的成本。

sentences.sContent: Pockets of thick fog get trapped along the ridgelines, magpies nest among the outcrops, and springs intermittently spray over the rocks.
sentences.sContent_eng: Pockets of thick fog get trapped along the ridgelines, magpies nest among the outcrops, and springs intermittently spray over the rocks.
sentences.sCn: 厚重的浓雾弥漫于山脊线，露头的岩层上还垒着喜鹊窝，间歇的山泉水喷洒在岩石之上。

words.tran: 时断时续，间歇性；周期性
间歇性；间歇现象；间歇度
间歇抽油装置；间歇调节器
